description:
Use it or lose it! 🧠 Did anyone tell you knowledge is power and the pen is mightier than the sword? Book burning never stopped it just renamed its self as Instagram censorship and “fake news” .
.
.🧠 We’ve been dumbed down and indoctrinated not to think. We’ve been dumbed down and told to believe the owned news outlets. To believe Hollywood. .
.
.🧠 Your brain is there for the taking, you have the power to control what you watch, think and believe. Use your mind to seek out the truth and the answers. .
.
.#Repost @enlighteningvibes_ 👏
• • • • • •
.
.
.
